name: ManageBGL, Inc.
description: Developer of a diabetes dose management application designed to manage insulin levels. The company's technology fuses the useful features of insulin devices and data logging apps, enabling patients to control and effectively forecast blood glucose levels hours in advance.
one_liner: Developer of a diabetes dose management application designed to manage insulin levels. The company's technology fuses the useful features of insulin devices and data logging apps, enabling patients to control and effectively forecast blood glucose levels hours in advance.
